short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a full two way integration between Gmail and DocMoto

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Integrates the DocMoto document and email management system with Gmail.

Features include allowing users to add email to DocMoto directly from the Gmail interface as well as select DocMoto documents for attachments.
